metadata.description: Available tools for the V-Agent system

message_user.name: message_user
message_user.description: Send a direct message to user (AI won't remember this).

pipeline_message.name: pipeline_message
pipeline_message.description: Send message through pipeline to AI (AI will remember this).

speak_for_user.name: speak_for_user
speak_for_user.description: Submit input as if it came from the user (speakforuser).

send_command.name: send_command
send_command.description: Send a generic system command (use specific tools if available).

control_action.name: control_action
control_action.description: Start or stop a system action/module.

fix_response.name: fix_response
fix_response.description: Load the last saved AI response for iteration.

set_context.name: set_context
set_context.description: Store a value in the AGENT'S PERSONAL short-term context.

get_context.name: get_context
get_context.description: Retrieve a value from the AGENT'S PERSONAL short-term context.

analyze_history.name: analyze_history
analyze_history.description: Analyze patterns in the AGENT'S GOAL HISTORY.

memory_store_fact.name: memory_store_fact
memory_store_fact.description: Store a fact in SYSTEM-WIDE long-term memory.

memory_list_facts.name: memory_list_facts
memory_list_facts.description: List all facts stored in SYSTEM-WIDE memory.

memory_delete_fact.name: memory_delete_fact
memory_delete_fact.description: Delete a fact from system memory.

persona_use.name: persona_use
persona_use.description: Switch to a specific AI persona.

persona_info.name: persona_info
persona_info.description: Get information about a specific persona.

prompt_active.name: prompt_active
prompt_active.description: Check which system prompt is active.

prompt_show.name: prompt_show
prompt_show.description: Show the content of a specific system prompt.

check_actions.name: check_actions
check_actions.description: Check which system actions/modules are active.

actions_info.name: actions_info
actions_info.description: Get information about available system actions.

api_status.name: api_status
api_status.description: Check AI API usage and limits.

api_switch_provider.name: api_switch_provider
api_switch_provider.description: Switch the active AI API provider.

api_reset_counter.name: api_reset_counter
api_reset_counter.description: Reset the API usage token counter.

principles_report.name: principles_report
principles_report.description: Get a report on principle adherence.

advisory_status.name: advisory_status
advisory_status.description: Get the current status of system advisories.

focus_status.name: focus_status
focus_status.description: Get the status of the text processing focus module.

block_list.name: block_list
block_list.description: List currently blocked items or patterns.

log_search.name: log_search
log_search.description: Search conversation history. Results appear in NEXT turn.

log_recent.name: log_recent
log_recent.description: Get recent conversation entries. Results appear in NEXT turn.

log_status.name: log_status
log_status.description: Check if there are pending log results.

wait_for_log_results.name: wait_for_log_results
wait_for_log_results.description: Send message to trigger log result injection.

sms_send.name: sms_send
sms_send.description: Send a text message via SMS plugin.

sandbox_reverse_text.description: Reverse a string of text using sandbox.

sandbox_get_var.description: Get a variable from the sandbox environment.

sandbox_set_var.name: sandbox_set_var
sandbox_set_var.description: Set a variable in the sandbox environment.

block_add.name: block_add

block_remove.name: block_remove
block_remove.description: Remove an item or pattern from the blocklist.
